title: Customized AI English Learning: Mobile Micro-Learning for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Communication Skills (Varied by Participant)
context.additional_context: A course where science professionals learn situational English expressions required in their work environments. It applies an AI-based learning system optimized for smartphone-only access.

learning_goals: Learners can use 500 core English expressions required for science-related work situations with 80% accuracy.
Learners enhance individual learning efficiency by 30% through personalized learning path recommendations by a deep learning-based system.
Learners complete an English communication portfolio applicable to real-world work scenarios through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
